import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { OrderModel } from 'app/modules/orders/models/Order' import { actions } from '../../redux/OrdersRedux' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Button, Modal, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalBody } from "reactstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector, shallowEqual } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from 'setup' import { Group } from '../../models/Order' import {updateAccount} from "../../../accounts/redux/AccountCRUD"; import {updateOrder} from "../../redux/OrdersCRUD"; type Props = { item: OrderModel close: () => void } const EditModal: React.FC = ({ item,close }) => { const role: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.role, shallowEqual) as string || "" const adding: boolean = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.adding, shallowEqual) as boolean || false //const groups: Group[] = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.groups, shallowEqual) as Group[] || [] //const orders: OrderModel[] = useSelector(({ orders }) => orders.orders, shallowEqual) as OrderModel[] || [] const dispatch = useDispatch() const [max_thread, setMax_thread] = useState(item.max_threads) const [view_percent,setView_percent]=useState(item.view_percent) const [home_rate,setHome_rate]=useState(0) const [search_rate,setSearch_rate]=useState(80) const [suggest_rate,setSuggest_rate]=useState(0) const [direct_rate,setDirect_rate]=useState(20) const [enabled,setEnabled]=useState(item.enabled) const [like_rate,setLike_rate]=useState(25) const [comment_rate,setComment_rate]=useState(25) const dismissModal = () => { dispatch(actions.clearcurrentOrder()) } const submit = () => { if(home_rate+search_rate+suggest_rate+direct_rate !=100){ alert("Tổng nguồn view không đúng") return } if(like_rate>100||like_rate<0){ alert("Tỉ lệ like không đúng") return } if(view_percent>100||view_percent<0){ alert("phần trăm xem video không đúng") return } dispatch(actions.requestUpdate({ ...item, home_rate, direct_rate, search_rate, enabled, max_thread, view_percent, suggest_rate })) } useEffect(() => { if (!adding) { close(); } }, [adding]) return (
Sửa nhiệm vụ cho {item.channel_title}

Cài đặt danh sách đơn

Nguồn view tổng = 100%

setHome_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSearch_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSuggest_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setDirect_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Cài đặt tương tác

setLike_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setComment_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMax_thread(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setView_percent(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" />
setEnabled(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={enabled} >
) } export default EditModal
